title: No Kissing and No Loving
itunes:title: No Kissing and No Loving
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, for the past two years, I have been friends with a really nice guy. He is very handsome, until he opens his mouth and shows his little scary looking shark teeth. After the first year of hanging out with each other, he said he wanted to take our friendship to the next level.....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
